<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  // Add confetti effect when the page loads
  party.confetti(document.querySelector('.hero'), {
    count: party.variation.range(50, 100),
    size: party.variation.range(0.6, 1.4),
    spread: 50,
  });
  
  // Add click event for more confetti on hero
  document.querySelector('.hero').addEventListener('click', (e) => {
    if (!e.target.closest('.nav-btn')) {
      party.sparkles(e.target, {
        count: party.variation.range(20, 40),
        speed: party.variation.range(100, 300),
      });
    }
  });
  
  // Add sparkle effect when hovering over buttons
  document.querySelectorAll('.nav-btn').forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('mouseenter', (e) => {
      party.sparkles(e.target, {
        count: party.variation.range(15, 25),
        speed: party.variation.range(100, 250),
      });
    });
  });
});
</script>
